parameters.name: REALTIME_TELEMETRY_FORMAT_ID
parameters.description:
Identification code that indicates
                    the realtime downlink rate and
                     format from the spacecraft.

parameters.name: RECORDER_FORMAT_ID
parameters.description:
Identification code that indicates
                     rate and format of data being
                     placed onto the spacecraft's  
                     tape recorder.

parameters.name: RIM_CORRECTED_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates the status of the     
                     spacecraft clock (SCLK) RIM count;
                     set to 0 if RIM was not corrected
                     and 1 if correction was applied.

parameters.name: MOD91_CORRECTED_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates the status of the SCLK
                     MOD91 count; set to 0 if MOD91 was
                     not corrected and 1 if correction
                     was applied.

parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates the status of the     
                     specification of the spacecraft
                     event time (SCET); set to 0 if
                     SCET was input from the Data Base
                     or set at 1 if SCET was calculated
                     by the raw generation program.

parameters.name: PLAYBACK_TELEMETRY_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates the realtime or playback
                     status of the raw data in the
                     present major frame record; set to
                     0 for realtime data, 1 for
                     playback data.

parameters.name: SCLK_VALID_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates whether the spacecraft
                     clock (SCLK) value is valid for
                     the present major frame record;
                     set to 0 if the corrected SCLK is
                     valid; set to 1 if the corrected
                     SCLK is invalid for the current
                     major frame format or if it 
                     deviates from the established
                     SCLK sync.

parameters.name: SCLK_REFERENCE_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates status as to whether
                     SCLK reference has been
                     established; set to 0 if two or
                     more successive frames with
                     compatible SCLK values have been
                     encountered; set to 1 if no
                     successive frames with compatible
                     SCLK values have been
                     encountered.

parameters.name: SCLK_CORRECTED_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates status as to whether  
                     SCLK has been corrected based on
                     extraction from higher order
                     module; set to 0 if parent frame
                     SCLK was not corrected; set to 1
                     if parent frame SCLK is corrected.

parameters.name: SCLK_COMPUTED_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates status as to whether the
                     SCLK value has been computed; set
                     to 0 if SCLK was processed as is
                     from S/C telemetry; set to 1 if
                     SCLK has been computed.

parameters.name: INSTRUMENT_PRISM_TEMP
parameters.description:
Converted thermistor reading from
                     science related engineering data
                     for thermistor located in the   
                     prism-detector assembly region of
                     the PPR.

parameters.name: INSTRUMENT_ELECTRONICS_TEMP
parameters.description:
Converted thermistor reading from
                     science related engineering data
                     for thermistor located in the   
                     main electronics of the PPR.

parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_YYDOY
parameters.description:
Spacecraft event time year minus
                     1900 and day-of-year (DOY)
                     expressed as a single integer
                     formed by adding DOY to
                     1000*(year-1900).

parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_HOURS
parameters.description:
Spacecraft event time hours     
                     within the current DOY.

parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_SEC
parameters.description:
Spacecraft event time seconds   
                     within the current hour.

parameters.name: SPACECRAFT_EVENT_TIME_MSEC
parameters.description:
Spacecraft event time           
                     milliseconds within the current
                     second.

parameters.name: RIM
parameters.description:
Count of the corrected spacecraft
                     clock RIM counter, which
                     increments by one (1) every 60 and
                     2/3 seconds, or 91 minor frames.

parameters.name: MOD91
parameters.description:
Count of the corrected spacecraft
                     clock MOD91 counter, which
                     increments by one (1) every 2/3 
                     second.

parameters.name: RIGHT_ASCENSION
parameters.description:
Right ascension of the instrument
                     boresight direction for the scan
                     platform.

parameters.name: DECLINATION
parameters.description:
Declination of the instrument
                     boresight direction for the scan
                     platform.

parameters.name: CONE_ANGLE
parameters.description:
Cone angle of the instrument    
                     boresight direction for the scan
                     platform.

parameters.name: CROSS_CONE_ANGLE
parameters.description:
Cross-cone, or clock, angle of  
                     the instrument boresight direction
                     for the scan platform.

parameters.name: MEMORY_BUFFER_ID
parameters.description:
Indicates which of the two PPR  
                     buffers is the source of the
                     presented data.

parameters.name: COMMAND_PARITY
parameters.description:
Indicates command parity status;
                     set to 1 when a parity error is
                     detected in a PPR control command
                     or when the operation code is
                     unidentified; otherwise is set  
                     to 0.

parameters.name: TELEMETRY_PARITY
parameters.description:
Indicates PPR telemetry data
                     parity status; set to 1 when a
                     parity error was detected in a
                     telemetry prepare or pickup; is
                     set to 0 if no parity error was
                     detected.

parameters.name: VALID_RECEIVED_COMMANDS
parameters.description:
The value of a counter that is  
                     incremented by one (1), modulo 4,
                     each time a PPR configuration
                     command without parity error is
                     received by the instrument.

parameters.name: OPERATION_MODE
parameters.description:
Mode of operation of the PPR    
                     instrument;
                     0 - transition mode,
                     1 - cycle mode,
                     2 - PhotoPolarimetry and
                         Photometry (PP/PH) mode,
                     3 - photometry mode,
                     4 - radiometry mode,
                     5 - position select mode.

parameters.name: POLARIMETRY_PHOT_GAIN_STEP
parameters.description:
Indicates the commanded gain step
                     used with the two photopolarimetry
                     -photometry silicon photodiode 
                     detectors; each step corresponds
                     to a gain factor of about 1.4.

parameters.name: RADIOMETRY_GAIN_STEP
parameters.description:
Indicates the commanded gain step
                     used with the lithium tantalate
                     pyroelectric detector employed for
                     radiometry; each step corresponds
                     to a gain factor of about 2.

parameters.name: SAMPLES
parameters.description:
Indicates the commanded number of
                     consecutive samples, either 1, 4,
                     16, or 256, of PPR data to be    
                     accumulated at each active
                     filter/retarder wheel position
                     (FRP) unless: 1) boom sequence
                     operation is commanded, or
                     2) position select mode is
                     operating with DC-restore on, in
                     which case the number of samples
                     is then interpreted as the number
                     of position select cycles to be
                     completed between successive times
                     during which the DC-restore
                     sequence is performed.

parameters.name: SAMPLES_FACTOR
parameters.description:
Indicates the factor, either 1  
                     or 4, that multiplies the
                     commanded number of samples to set
                     the actual number of samples to be
                     accumulated at the radiometry
                     positions of the PPR
                     filter/retarder wheel; also, if
                     the external calibration lamp is
                     activated, the on period for the
                     lamp is six samples if
                     SAMPLES_FACTOR is 1 or the total
                     number of samples for the s/c spin
                     period if it is 4.

parameters.name: ADDITIONAL_FILTER_POSITIONS
parameters.description:
Indicates the number of additional
                     positions of the filter/retarder
                     wheel beyond the programmed FRP 
                     which are used in the operating
                     sequence when position select mode
                     is commanded.

parameters.name: CALIBRATION_LAMP_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates the commanded status of
                     internal calibration lamp during
                     the chopper stopping period, on   
                     for 1, off for 0; also sets the
                     external calibration lamp to on
                     state if set at 1 and if boom
                     sequence operation is in effect, 
                     while inhibiting external lamp
                     operation if set at 0.

parameters.name: DC_RESTORE_INITIATE_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates whether a special     
                     sequence to perform DC-restore
                     operation is to occur
                     periodically between the cycles of
                     active filter/retarder wheel
                     positions when position select
                     mode is commanded; set to 1 to
                     enable DC-restore sequences, set
                     to 0 to inhibit them.

parameters.name: BOOM_SEQ_OPERATION_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates whether the stepping  
                     between active filter/retarder
                     wheel positions is controlled by
                     the commanded number of samples
                     (flag set at 0) or is timed with
                     respect to the s/c spin period
                     (flag set at 1); also affects
                     operation of the external 
                     calibration lamp, which is powered
                     on only if boom sequence operation
                     is commanded on (flag set at 1).

parameters.name: SPARE_A_FLAG
parameters.description:
Spare bit in PPR data buffer 
                                            always set at 0.

parameters.name: REPEAT_BUFFER_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates whether the current PPR
                     data buffer contents have been
                     read out and placed into the
                     telemetry stream previously by the
                     s/c (flag set at 1) or not.

parameters.name: PROGRAMMED_FILTER_POSITION
parameters.description:
Indicates the commanded starting
                     FRP to be used if position select
                     mode is commanded; for other
                     modes, the
                     PROGRAMMED_FILTER_POSITION value
                     is ignored.

parameters.name: TEMPERATURE_RANGE
parameters.description:
Indicates the range used (low for
                     0, high for 1) for the PPR science
                     temperature data.

parameters.name: SPARE_B_FLAG
parameters.description:
Spare bit in PPR data buffer
                     always set at 0.

parameters.name: HOUSEKEEPING_STATUS_PARITY
parameters.description:
Parity indicator (odd) for the  
                     housekeeping status portion of the
                     PPR data buffer, bytes #1-6 of the
                     18 bytes for the complete buffer.

parameters.name: TEMPERATURE_DATA
parameters.description:
Science temperature data 
                     unconverted from the 12-bit
                     thermistor readout; temperature
                     data for ten thermistors within
                     the PPR instrument and three
                     positions on the radiometric
                     calibration target are
                     sequentially generated, with the
                     respective position identified by
                     TEMPERATURE_ID.

parameters.name: TEMPERATURE_ID
parameters.description:
Identifies the element whose    
                     temperature data is presented as
                     the preceding TEMPERATURE_DATA.

parameters.name: DATA_PRESENT_FLAG
parameters.description:
Indicates status of PPR data for
                     the current minor frame; set to 0
                     if data is present; set to 1 if 
                     all or part of the minor frame
                     data is missing in the telemetry
                     stream.

parameters.name: RADIOMETRY_DATA_FLAG
parameters.description:
Identifies data sample pair as  
                     photopolarimetry/photometry scene
                     science samples for flag set to 0
                     and as a radiometry scene sample
                     plus a science temperature data
                     sample when the flag is 1.

parameters.name: FILTER_POSITION
parameters.description:
Indicates the filter/retarder
                     wheel position at which the data
                     sample pair SAMPLE_A_DATA and
                     SAMPLE_B_DATA are acquired.

parameters.name: CAL_LAMP_BOOM_SEQUENCE_TAG
parameters.description:
Indicator used both to indicate 
                     that either internal or external
                     calibration lamp is on and to
                     serve as a marker that separates
                     data taken on successive s/c spins
                     if boom sequence operation is
                     active.

parameters.name: DATA_PARITY
parameters.description:
Parity indicator (odd) for science
                     data sample pair SAMPLE_A_DATA and
                     SAMPLE_B_DATA.

parameters.name: SAMPLE_A_DATA
parameters.description:
Is the first PP/PH science data 
                     sample of the simultaneously
                     obtained pair corresponding to the
                     orthogonal polarization components
                     separated by the PPR Wollaston
                     prism or a radiometry scene sample
                     if RADIOMETRY_DATA_FLAG is 1.

parameters.name: SAMPLE_B_DATA
parameters.description:
Is the second of the pair of PP/PH
                     science data samples or a science
                     temperature data sample if    
                     RADIOMETRY_DATA_FLAG is 1.

parameters.name: SAMPLE_PAIR_NUMBER
parameters.description:
Indicates the time-ordered number
                     of the sample pair SAMPLE_A_DATA
                     and SAMPLE_B_DATA from the three
                     pairs contained in the PPR minor
                     frame buffer.
